description: This file contains CMake functions, macros, and scripts related to build configuration and package management, specifically for handling target dependencies, link libraries, include directories, and generating installation configuration files. It provides utility functions for building and installing CMake configuration files, find modules, and managing target properties.

methods.name: add_element
methods.description: Appends an element to a list variable.

methods.name: get_if_link_libraries
methods.description: Retrieves linked libraries and directories for a target, handling imported and local targets, and resolving dependencies including interface link libraries.

methods.name: get_if_compile_defines
methods.description: Collects all compile definitions for a target, including interface and dependency definitions.

methods.name: get_if_compile_options
methods.description: Gather compile options for a target, including interface options and dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_include_dirs
methods.description: Retrieves include directories for a target, resolving nested interface directories and handling relative paths.

methods.name: InstallCMakeConfig
methods.description: Generates and installs CMake configuration files (.cmake) for a target, supporting dependencies and templates.

methods.name: InstallPackageConfig
methods.description: Generates and installs a pkg-config (.pc) file for a target, including compile options, defines, include paths, and libraries.

methods.name: InstallFindModule
methods.description: Installs custom CMake FindModules (*.cmake) from specified directories or files, with optional recursion.

methods.name: print_properties
methods.description: Prints a list of CMake property names supported.

methods.name: print_target_properties
methods.description: Displays all property values for a specific CMake target.

methods.name: semicolon_safe_string
methods.description: Replaces semicolons in a string with ASCII 31 to make it safe for including in CMake variables.

methods.name: InstallCompatibleCMakeConfig
methods.description: Creates and installs an 'compatible' interface library that links to an existing target, supporting legacy use cases and headers.
